sn51.25:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these four bases of psychic power.
sn51.25:4.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis for psychic power that has samādhi due to enthusiasm … energy …
sn51.25:4.6: These are the four bases of psychic power.
sn51.25:4.7: Because of developing and cultivating these four bases of psychic power, one of two results can be expected:
sn51.25:4.8: final knowledge in the present life, or if there’s something left over, non-return.”
